Hotel Camiral

The resort is a contemporary 5-star hotel, part of the PGA Golf Club complex. The complex is located inland on the Costa Brava region, surrounded by nature, and around 20 mins drive to the actual coastline. It takes around 1h 15mins by bus from BCN airport to the resort. The facilities boast two of the best golf courses in Europe, and it is surrounded by nature.

Hotel Camiral has a total of 145rooms, of different categories, but they all feature modern decoration and offer amazing views. All in all, the resort breathes tranquility. The Deluxe rooms are the ones that are offered to corporate groups more frequently.

The Meeting rooms come in many sizes in this hotel, but they are all fully equipped. They have a total of 10meeting rooms, ranging from 20pax to 450px (theatre set up). All rooms are fitted with the latest generation AAVV technology. Free-wifi, LCD projectors and all sorts of connection outlets. The rooms have natural light.

Other facilities include 1477 - a fine dining restaurant with "al fresco" terrace, The Club Caf√© - a Clublhouse Bistro for a more informal dining option, the Lounge Bar and the Pool bar. If that's your thing, the Wellness centre is just one of a kind.

If you are staying for business, the resort offers a wide range of different meeting room sizes, featuring natural light, and good WIFI connection.
